import React from 'react'; import{Col,Row} from 'reactstrap'; import {Tab,Breadcrumb,Card,Accordion,Button,Dropdown,DropdownButton} from 'react-bootstrap' import './WVDTab.css'; const DropDownTabs = (props) =>{ return (
Goals Accuracy Tackles Accuracy Passes Accuracy

In this all Accuracy will shown in the on graph

Goal Accuracy

Tackle Accuracy

passes Accuracy
); } class WVDTab extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { teamname:'', goalWonD1:'', goalAttmpD1:'', tackleWonD1:'', tackleAttmpD1:'', passesWonD1:'', passesAttmpD1:'', goalWonD2:'', goalAttmpD2:'', tackleWonD2:'', tackleAttmpD2:'', passesWonD2:'', passesAttmpD2:'', goalWonD3:'', goalAttmpD3:'', tackleWonD3:'', tackleAttmpD3:'', passesWonD3:'', passesAttmpD3:'', goalWonD4:'', goalAttmpD4:'', tackleWonD4:'', tackleAttmpD4:'', passesWonD4:'', passesAttmpD4:'', goalWonD5:'', goalAttmpD5:'', tackleWonD5:'', tackleAttmpD5:'', passesWonD5:'', passesAttmpD5:'', goalWonD6:'', goalAttmpD6:'', tackleWonD6:'', tackleAttmpD6:'', passesWonD6:'', passesAttmpD6:'', goalWonD7:'', goalAttmpD7:'', tackleWonD7:'', tackleAttmpD7:'', passesWonD7:'', passesAttmpD7:'', GoalAccuracyweekly:'', TackleAccuracyweekly:'', PassesAccuracyweekly:'', } } componentDidMount(){ const isLoggedIn = localStorage.getItem('isLoggedIn') if(isLoggedIn){ fetch(`http://localhost:5000/weekly/${localStorage.getItem('WVDplayername')}`).then(data=>{ return data.json() }).then(data=>{ this.setState({goalWonD1:data.goalWon,goalAttmpD1:data.goalAttmp, tackleWonD1:data.tackleWon,tackleAttmpD1:data.taackleAttmp, passesWonD1:data.passesWon,passesAttmpD1:data.passesAttmp}); console.log(this.state) }) } } render(){ const name = localStorage.getItem('WVDplayername'); const matchdate = localStorage.getItem('WVDmatchdate') return(
Dashboard WVD TAB
{/* Card of user */}
Player Details{' '}
 {name} India

Match Date:-{matchdate}

GOALS ATTMP:6 {/* -----------------------------------END-------------------------------------------------------------------*/} {/* -----------------------------------ACCORDION Tackles-----------------------------------------------------*/} Tackles  Tackles WONS:5



Tackles ATTMP:6 {/* -----------------------------------END-------------------------------------------------------------------*/} {/* -----------------------------------ACCORDION Tackles-----------------------------------------------------*/} Passes  Passes WONS:5



passes ATTMP:6 {/* -----------------------------------END-------------------------------------------------------------------*/} {/* SIDE RENDER TAB */}
); } } export default WVDTab;
